explanations.machine learning: The paper develops a Q&A text risk recognition model using machine learning techniques.
explanations.deep learning: The model is based on deep learning architectures, specifically Bi-directional LSTM and attention mechanism.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model uses neural networks, specifically Bi-directional LSTM, which is a type of recurrent neural network.
explanations.long short-term memory: The model employs Bi-directional Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) for text analysis.
explanations.LSTM: The model uses Bi-directional LSTM for processing sequential text data.
explanations.attention mechanism: The model incorporates an attention mechanism to improve text risk recognition.
